#vant超过两行...可展开

8.如果文字超过两行，显示。。。（在vant下），下箭头可展开。不超过两行不显示下箭头

![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)


showAngle:false
此处很重要，初始值一定要是false，van-multi-ellipsis--l2（多于两行省略）的样式展示之前去获取p的高度

```
   <div>
            <div v-if="isAllSkill"
                 class="content-box">
              <!-- :class="{'active_height' : !isAllSkill}" -->
              <p :class="{'van-multi-ellipsis--l2':showAngle}"
                 ref="skill"
                 id="skill">
                <span>擅长：</span>{{docInfo.skill ? docInfo.skill : "医生还未完善信息"}}</p>
              <p :class="{'van-multi-ellipsis--l2':showAngle}"
                 ref="info"
                 id="info">
                <span>简介：</span>{{docInfo.info ? docInfo.info : docInfo.level}}</p>
            </div>
            <div v-if="!isAllSkill"
                 class="content-box">
              <p>
                <span>擅长：</span>{{docInfo.skill ? docInfo.skill : "医生还未完善信息"}}</p>
              <p>
                <span>简介：</span>{{docInfo.info ? docInfo.info : docInfo.level}}</p>
            </div>
            <!--下箭头-->
            <div class="control_btn"
                 @click="isAllSkill = !isAllSkill"
                 v-if="showAngle">
              <img :src="require('@/assets/images/newjtys/'+isAllSkill+'.png')"
                   alt="">
            </div>
          </div>

     this.$nextTick(() => {

                const skill = this.$refs.skill
                const info = this.$refs.info

                const skillElem = document.getElementById('skill')
                let style = window.getComputedStyle(skillElem, null)
                let maxHeight = parseInt(style.lineHeight) * 2;

                if (skill.clientHeight <= maxHeight && info.clientHeight <= maxHeight) {
                  this.showAngle = false
                } else {
                  this.showAngle = true
                }
              })
```
